dependencies.dependency: TASK-020: Add Unit Tests for Builders
TASK-021: Create Integration Tests with Testcontainers

task.description: Configure JaCoCo for code coverage reporting and ensure coverage meets the 80% threshold. Set up coverage reports that can be viewed locally and integrated with CI/CD.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: JaCoCo plugin configured in parent POM
Build fails if coverage below threshold

implementation-notes.note: Configure jacoco-maven-plugin in parent POM: - prepare-agent goal for test instrumentation - report goal for HTML/XML reports - check goal for threshold enforcement
Exclude generated code and DTOs from coverage
Consider separate coverage for unit vs integration tests

testing-requirements.requirement: Run 'mvn clean verify' and verify coverage report generated
Test build fails if coverage drops below threshold
